item.title: 测试
item.description:
测试一下

package main


import (
    "fmt"
)


func main() {
    var t interface{}
    t = 2
    // if t =2 ,out 4 ;if t = "a" ,out "aa"

    switch t := t.(type) {
    default:
        fmt.Printf("unexpected type %T", t) // %T prints whatever type t has
    case int:
        tt := t + t
        fmt.Println(tt)
    case string:
        tt := t + t
        fmt.Println(tt)
    }


}
